name: Hasan Shehabi

services.title: Associate - Systems Analyst
services.description: Develop and maintain inhouse applications. Perform market research for Engineering based applications for core business use. Manage Fuel Managment System for local gas stations.

services.title: Systems Analyst
services.description: Developed and deployed API for internal use. Maintained customer accounts in ECommerce site (Eshop). Performed maintenance on the Batelco mobile app and reported issues to development team to resolve.

services.title: Software Developer Intern
services.description: Developed a Queue Management System for local service centers. Worked on the backend infrastructure, and setting up logic for Role-based access controls using MVC (Model, View, Controller) Framework in C#.
